long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickSearch Plus allows translators and reviewers to search a wide range of client repositories in both the source and target language. It can be used by reviewers to perform quick alignment clean-ups in the TC, log LQE issues with just one click, and augment comments with pre-authored content.

Update in this release: 
- Now supports RTL languages
- Added a text snippet function
- Added a checkbox to propagate TC IDs
